StatDef.label: joy fall rate
StatDef.description: A multiplier on the speed that a person's recreation need falls.

StatDef.label: relationship with allied fellow pack bond
StatDef.description: A modifier to the relationship between two pawns of the same faction sharing the gene Pack Bond.

StatDef.label: vegetable nutrition factor
StatDef.description: A multiplier on how nutritious vegetables and vegetable-based foods are for this person. If a meal contains both vegetables and animal products, the effect is only partial.

StatDef.label: animal nutrition factor
StatDef.description: A multiplier on how nutritious meat and animal product derived foods are for this person. If a meal contains both vegetables and animal products, the effect is only partial.
